text:
@MattHancock "An accountant from East Grinstead “I had the most appalling diarrhoea. I couldn’t go two minutes without bolting for the pan. So I decided to put my wife and kids in the car and drive them to Margate for a picnic"
Mark Steel our turn to make up stories. https://t.co/E5xUHBpao6
